import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' let block_len = 0 const Sidebar = (props) => { const block = props.input.blocks try { const block_len = Object.keys(block).length } catch (error) { console.log(error) const block_len = 0; } return(
{props.input.blank === false &&

); } const test = { color: "white", textAlign: "center" } const link_style = { fontSize: "20pt", fontWeight: "bold", marginLeft: "10%" } export default Sidebar
